questions: Is there a pair of sunglasses in the image?
Is there a mirror in the image?
Are the sunglasses under the mirror?
Are the sunglasses white in color?
Is the mirror green in color?
model_output:
yes there is a pair of sunglasses visible in the image.
yes there appears to be a reflective surface that could be considered a mirror.
no the sunglasses are placed on top of the reflective surface, not under it.
yes one pair of the sunglasses has a white frame.
no mirrors typically do not have a green color; the reflective surface beneath the sunglasses has a green tint.
